name: A wander in a cave
description:
'A wander in a cave' is a diorama of a not-so-dead space. There are no exits, no endings, only a little patch of virtual space to explore and interact with. 

This was made in a little over two hours when I stumbled across the bitsy jam theme of 'moss' last night. I hope you enjoy!

Made with Adam Le Doux's bitsy.
